NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_TITLE: Welcome to the Jay Or La App
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The Jay Or La App is an attender app, which will make you organize your events easily

WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app
